decision_conditions: Please be advised that this application approves the partial discharge of Condition 19 (Secured by Design) as attached to planning permission ref. 1331/APP/2019/2314 in relation to Block F3/F4 only.  In effect, this application permits the discharge of the first part of Condition 18 in relation to Block F3/F4 and the second part of the Condition requires that such measures are implemented and that 'Secured by Design' accreditation is achieved.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 19 (Secured by Design - Block F3/F4) as attached to planning permission ref. 1331/APP/2019/2314 dated 28-06-2021 (Development of 4 no. new buildings comprising residential units (in addition to those approved under planning permission ref: 1331/APP/2017/1883), a basement extension to Block B, flexible commercial uses (Class E) and associated landscaping, access, car parking and other engineering works)
